q: New York Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand 's request. The two women and House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room holding her hand when her eye fluttered open. Kirsten Gillibrand told reporters the congresswomen were telling Gabrielle Giffords how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength. And then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do after she got better. Gabrielle Giffords was gripping their hands, "and the more we joked about what we were going to do, she started to open her eyes."
